content: this is a summary of a legal case in ljubljana the case involved a dispute between two expartners over the division of their coowned property which included a threeroom apartment and credit sums the court determined that the plaintiff had a 310 share and the defendant had a 710 share the defendant was awarded costs of 47638 eur which the plaintiff must pay the legal procedure lasted for 6 years 11 months and 22 days the court also dismissed the defendants counterclaim and ordered them to reimburse the plaintiff for the costs of the proceedings the plaintiff alleged that the defendant had been living separately since 1986 and refused to hand over relevant documents the court determined that the apartments were coowned property and assigned shares accordingly the court also made a judgment regarding the costs of the proceedings awarding costs to both parties based on the value of the dispute the court explained the process of lodging an appeal including the time limit necessary information and payment of court fees the summary is dated january 17 2017 in ljubljana
